meaning_str.bing:
n. 停车；停车场；泊车；停车位
v. “park”的现在分词

停车；停车场；泊车；停车位

停放车辆；把车停在路边；停车；（park的现在分词）

1.en: Providing more parking areas, in the long run, has proved to be a practical way out in many large cities in the world.
1.cn: 从长远的利益来看，提供更多的停车位证明是许多世界大城市切实可行的出路。

2.en: "Solar trees" are beginning to shade parking lots, their panels beautifully tilting to face the sun as it moves.
2.cn: “日光树”正开始在各停车厂推广普及，它会随日光照射角度的变化，准确地移动倾斜角度。

3.en: He took a glimpse at the 'No Parking' signs outside Jasper's gate and parked his car there.
3.cn: 他瞥了一眼贾斯珀家大门外边的那些“禁止停车”的牌子，然后把车停在了那里。（有意识的、短暂的动作）

0.en: I'm sorry. 294? Yeah. That's my parking spot.
0.cn: 等等，294号位吗？是的。那是我的停车位。

1.en: I don't want another parking space. I want my parking space. It's perfect.
1.cn: 我不要别的停车位，我要我那个停车位，那可是完美车位。

2.en: So the truth is I was arrested for failure to pay parking tickets. Parking tickets?
2.cn: 事实是因为没能付清停车罚单，我被拘留了。罚单? 什么?

3.en: Oh, yeah. I had to. There was never any parking by the psychology building.
3.cn: 没办法，心理系的楼旁边很难停车。

4.en: Why do you have a parking spot? You don't have a car. You don't even drive.
4.cn: 你怎么会有个停车位，你都没车，你连车都不开。

5.en: So, did you spend last night hearing about this silly parking space fight, too?
5.cn: 你昨晚是不是也得听他抱怨那场白痴的停车位大战？

6.en: Sheldon, someday, if you get a car, I'm sure they'll give you another parking space.
6.cn: 谢尔顿，哪天你买车了，他们肯定还会再给你个停车位的。

7.en: Don't try to change the subject. This is about a parking space. It has nothing to do with cars.
7.cn: 别想转移话题，我们是在谈停车位，跟有没有车毫无关系。

8.en: It's ironic, but the point is we can't trust you. You're a sketchy character in a parking garage.
8.cn: 虽然很讽刺，但重点是我们无法信任你，你只是个在停车场的鬼祟男。

9.en: Hey. Hi you guys. Look who I found standing outside of the Szechwan Dragon staring at a parking meter.
9.cn: 你们好啊，你看我在四川龙餐厅外找到谁了？她盯着停车收费表看。

10.en: Then you give up on anyone ever loving you, go to Marie Callender's, buy a pie and eat it in your car in the parking lot.
10.cn: 然后你就自暴自弃，跑去连锁派店买了个派，然后回到停车场，在车上默默吃掉它。

11.en: I don't have to take this. I'm gonna go home and have sex with my husband right now. Maybe I'll let him do it to me in the parking spot.
11.cn: 我没必要听你冷嘲热讽，老娘现在就回家跟我的老公做爱，可能还让他干我"停车位"呢。

12.en: I did a comprehensive background check. Medical records, credit reports, criminal history. I trust you paid off those parking tickets.
12.cn: 我对你的背景做了全面的调查，医疗记录，信用记录，犯罪史等等，我相信你已经缴清了那些停车罚单了吧。

13.en: What's going on? Hot girl in Sheldon's office. Sheldon's office? Is she lost? I don't think so. I followed her here from the parking lot.
13.cn: 在这干什么呢？谢尔顿办公室有个靓妹。在谢尔顿的办公室？她是不是走丢了？我认为不是，我从停车场就开始跟着她了。

14.en: I asked her out to a movie. So, Friday? Friday. Friday. And I went to watch the track meet. Not long after, this thing happened in the parking lot.
14.cn: 我约她出去看电影了。那么就星期五？星期五。星期五。然后我就回去看田径比赛了。过了不久，停车场里出事了。

15.en: I hadn't seen him for a while. And when I was leaving the ceremony, he was waiting in the parking lot. He was holding this case of a big ribbon around it.
15.cn: 那会儿我有一段时间没见到他了，典礼结束后我走出去，他就在停车场里面等着，手里拿着一只盒子，上面还绑了大大的缎带。

16.en: And finally, our first bunny, Officer Hopps. Parking duty. Dismissed.
16.cn: 最后，第一只兔子，霍普斯警官，交通协管，解散。

17.en: Take whatever you want! Just don't hurt me! A parking boot? Why do I have a parking boot on? What's going on here? Please!
17.cn: 你想要什么都给你，不要伤害我。轮胎锁？为什么我的轮胎被锁上了，发生了什么事？

18.en: Okay. What do you think? Parking brake slide right up to the school?
18.cn: 好，你觉得怎么样？拉着手刹漂移到学校门口如何？

19.en: Parking duty? Chief? Chief Bogo? Sir. You said there were fourteen missing mammal cases.
19.cn: 交通协管？局长？牛局长？长官，你说有14起哺乳动物失踪案。
